document.full_text: on friday night, an employee of sny, the mets' network, played a prank - perhaps for april fool's day - after the mets' opening night loss to the florida marlins.
document.title: a prank on the mets, but sny isn't laughing
lines_and_colors: on friday night, an employee of sny, the mets' network, played a prank - perhaps for april fool's day - after the mets' opening night loss to the florida marlins.
